channel.title: Alan Ritchson on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: ‘Motor City’ Stars Shailene Woodley and Ben Foster on Method Dressing and New (Dialogue-Free) Film
item.description: The actors sat down with The Hollywood Reporter during the Venice Film Festival to talk playlists, Potsy Ponciroli’s experimental action thriller and whether or not they’ve seen ‘Reacher.’

item.title: Alan Ritchson on His ‘Super-Unique’ Dialogue-Free Revenge Thriller ‘Motor City,’ Making ‘Action Better Than Anybody’ and the Conversation He Had With James Gunn About Playing Batman
item.description: In his first-ever film as an actor to premiere at a major festival, “Reacher” hero Alan Ritchson says absolutely nothing. Well, almost nothing. “Motor City,” world premiering i
